price: 82. Tama Baxxaqqah lakal tama xaganat derre caba mari, toysa woo mari usun Yallih diinii kee kay Amrik yewqe mага kinnon.
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
